attributes.action: BRITAX (road tax for foriegn hauliers to pay to use our roads )
attributes.additional_details:
to have a  road tax imposed on foriegn hauliers to use our roads
money to use under europeon law for capital projects
(high speed two ) (darford river crossing )
simple tax £10 per day
help to redress the fact they dont buy diesal in this counrty
easy to impose as an island
balance the system as european have road tax for foriegn hauliers in place and their money is used for capital projects
